alert.note: Alert for NCC000 (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued April 24 at 10:31PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...EAS Child Abduction Emergency... The following message is transmitted at the request of North Carolina Department of Public Safety. THIS IS A NORTH CAROLINA AMBER ALERT FOR A CHILD ABDUCTION....THE CHAPEL HILL POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR ARIELLE WILLIAMS . ARIELLE WILLIAMS IS A 5-YEAR-OLD BLACK FEMALE APPROXIMATELY 3 FEET 5 INCHES TALL WEIGHING 45 POUNDS. SHE HAS BLK HAIR AND BROWN EYES AND WAS LAST SEEN WEARING A TYE-DYE SHIRT ADIDAS SHOES AND BLUE JEANS. THE ABDUCTOR IS UNKNOWN . THEY WERE LAST KNOWN IN THE AREA OF NC751 AND NEW HOPE CHURCH ROAD IN A BLUE 2003 DODGE DURANGO WITH NC LICENSE TAG NUMBER TDS-4340. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS CASE CALL THE CHAPEL HILL POLICE DEPARTMENT IMMEDIATELY AT 919 612-8240 OR CALL 911 OR HP. THIS IS A NORTH CAROLINA AMBER ALERT ACTIVATE CMAS IN REGION 6 7 8 9 10
